text: Nikolai Aleksandrovich Antropov (Russian: Николай Александрович Антропов; born February 18, 1980) is a Kazakhstani-Canadian former professional ice hockey forward. He played parts of fourteen seasons in the National Hockey League (NHL). He played for the Toronto Maple Leafs, New York Rangers, Atlanta Thrashers, and Winnipeg Jets. He also played for Dynamo Moscow, Ak Bars Kazan, and Lokomotiv Yaroslavl of the Russian Superleague (RSL), and Barys Astana of the Kontinental Hockey League (KHL). ==Career statistics== ===Regular
